name: protean

effect.sun_moon: Changes the bearer's type to match each move it uses. The type change takes place just before the move is used.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Changes the bearer's type to match each move it uses. The type change takes place just before the move is used.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Changes the bearer's type to match each move it uses. The type change takes place just before the move is used.

short_effect: Changes the bearer's type to match each move it uses.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Changes the Pokémon’s type to the type of the move it’s about to use.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Changes the Pokémon’s type to the type of the move it’s about to use.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Changes the Pokémon’s type to the type of the move it’s about to use.
